name: Speed cars racing championship
description:
Do you love to compete? Are you crazy for speed? Then Speed cars - racing championship could be a very good choice. This is a cool fast-pass racing game for your free time. Try your driving skills, play in the single player mode or compete with your friends or family members in the local multiplayer and become the winner!

Start the game, choose your favorite car and start your own race for dominance. Drive as fast as you can, keep your eye on the road and be ready for surprises on the road. Build the ride that shows your style with an unbelievable cars, drive fast and fearless, proof that your are the best. You can play fair or unfair, if you can not drive faster then your opponent, kick him out of the road. Do your best and feel the taste of victory!Key features of "Speed cars - racing championship":
  • 23 unbelievable cars
  • 3 different tracks
  • 2 driving modes: arcade and time trial
  • 3 levels of difficulty: easy, medium, expert
  • single-player experience
  • split-screen mode
  • local multiplayer
